email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

I hope this email finds you well.

We are pleased to offer the following for your consideration:

Commodity: Coal
Quantity: 50,000 MT
Load Port: Newcastle
Discharge Port: Shanghai
Incoterms: FOB
Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE, DWT 75,000, LOA 225m
Freight: USD 25/MT
Laycan: 20-25 October 2023

This offer is firm for 48 hours. Please let us know your thoughts.

Best regards,
John Doe
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the offer. USD 25/MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 22/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and laytime details?

Best regards,
Jane Smith
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

Thank you for your prompt response. I can adjust the rate to USD 23/MT, which is the best we can do at this time. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata, and the laytime is 72 hours for loading and 72 hours for discharging.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 23/MT is acceptable. Can we confirm the laycan as 20-25 October and proceed with the booking? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Jane,

Great! I’ve attached the charter party for your review. The details are as follows:

Commodity: Coal
Quantity: 50,000 MT
Load Port: Newcastle
Discharge Port: Shanghai
Incoterms: FOB
Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
Freight: USD 23/MT
Laycan: 20-25 October 2023
Demurrage: USD 10,000/day pro rata

Please let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmed: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

The charter party looks good. We’ll proceed as agreed. Thanks for your assistance!

Best regards,
Jane
